PModel

Class Manageable

  • java.lang.Object
    • PModel.Manageable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Activity, Project

    public abstract class Manageable
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class from which all manageable objects are derived, including Projects and Activities.
    Author:
    Alex Huot
